ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: Navbar button focus
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hello, Something is wrong with the navbar buttons focus, border-radius make focus look like an elipse. ## Environment * Browser Name and version: Firefox Dev Edition * Operating System and version (desktop or mobile): Mac OSX ## Screenshot ![Screenshot 2021-05-31 at 17-00-59 NocoDB](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9987732/120212132-ed93bb00-c231-11eb-80d4-c80d3e04c390.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: refactor: move mkdirp dependency Move `mkdirp` dependency from devDependencies to dependencies re #212 Signed-off-by: Pranav C Balan <pranavxc@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix(gui): correct border radius of navbar icons fix #211 Signed-off-by: Pranav C Balan <pranavxc@gmail.com>
